As an athlete, you need to accept your role on the team. It doesnâ€™t matter if your role is to be the leading scorer or the glue guy, you must be willing and eager to do it for the sake of the team.

Get you a team that welcomes you back like this! Also personal suggestion donâ€™t get tossed in the 2 inning of a eventual 11 inning game. Longest 3 hours of my coaching career. https://t.co/3zpCHxH1mG

Our athletes deserve our attention beyond the playing field demands

Surprise off-days, small conversations, and investing in their growth mentally goes a long way

Athletes just being reminded that they are good enough and capable has a lasting impact.
